web_snippets: Megan Barth. Published writer, editor, researcher and founding Editor of The Nevada Globe. The Nevada Globe Northern Illinois University. Las Vegas ...
Biography ... Megan Barth is known for He Would Say (2021), War Raw the Daily Podcast (2020) and Fine Point with Chanel Rion (2024).
Megan Barth is the founding editor of The Nevada Globe. She has written for The Hill, The Washington Times, The Daily Wire, American Thinker, Canada Free Press ...
